net.medcommons.identity
Class IdentityServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          net.medcommons.identity.IdentityServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
LoginServlet, LogoutServlet, RegisterServlet
public class IdentityServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

Abstract Base Class for the identity webapp's servlets.

This class handles the cookies provided by the PingFederate server, maintains the pool of IdentityConnections, and handles the default case of displaying the login/registration page.

See Also:
Serialized Form
